column6: Bio

Living on unceded Wurundjeri land. Born on land belonging to the Cherokee. Naarm (Melbourne) is all I need. #Palestine. Promiscuous follower. Cyclist (gravel preferred). Capitalism will kill us all. Interested in semiotics, whatever that is. Atheist. Social Democrat. ENTP. Love science. Stream MUBI. Observing the end of the Anthropocene with interest. Screw Qantas. The unexamined life is not worth living. Everything is political. Everything.

#Criminal defence lawyer in Metro #Vancouver, #BritishColumbia

Previously: civil litigation attorney in AL + MN; background in 1st, 4th Amendment law & #QualifiedImmunity
